BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Using the credentials of the user who calls reindex data stream (#117938)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Ignore order in LookupMessageFromIndexKeepReordered (#118256) Fix #118150 Fix #118151 We should also ignore the order for this test, as the output rows are not deterministic in all cases.
